item.title: Movie Producer David Brown Indicted in $12 Million Fraud Involving Fake Covid Tests and a Patty Hearst Film
item.description: Movie producer David Brown was arrested Wednesday on charges that he defrauded business partners out of $12 million by creating fake companies and using investor funds to pay his personal expenses. Br
